data.strFullDescription:
[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/29d266513ab49288461f5db02a342d2b.poster.avif?t=1748077331" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/29d266513ab49288461f5db02a342d2b.webm?t=1748077331"][/imgvid]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/fbcc726abd506b43400ea1d4f03e4ed0.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
Embark on a chill experience alone or with up to 10+ friends in online co-op. Your mission is to survive on a hostile planet and turn a barren land into a lush paradize. Terraforming is the only way!

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/334be60a6b628312193f87232248fee2.poster.avif?t=1748077331" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/334be60a6b628312193f87232248fee2.webm?t=1748077331"][/imgvid]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/243b0ebb3b87264bfc50ade6cba32983.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
You are sent on a hostile planet with one mission: Make it habitable for Humans. You'll have to survive, collect resources, build your base, produce machines to heat the planet, create an oxygen-rich atmosphere and eventually geo-engineer an entire planet!

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/805d7e7cae3497e16f037839e38cb040.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
Gather minerals and resources to survive. Craft all the tools you need to fulfill your mission. Explore old shipwrecks and ruins and discover a planet full of mysteries!

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/0b7064ac9756849e7e2db60c5d1ead43.poster.avif?t=1748077331" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/0b7064ac9756849e7e2db60c5d1ead43.webm?t=1748077331"][/imgvid]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/d35ad2511a076213f96c8d7ce467833d.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
You'll need a base and all sorts of machines to make yourself at home, and be able to bring life to this planet! Progress through building tiers to upgrade and expand your base and explore the planet further.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/d0526ae0c2e67610ca9ca1ee7ee00747.poster.avif?t=1748077331" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/d0526ae0c2e67610ca9ca1ee7ee00747.webm?t=1748077331"][/imgvid]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/fa1f4d8239801f307dce70afc0c2ec74.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
See life forms appear on the planet as you terraform it by increasing heat, oxygen and pressure. Witness the first signs of life with moss and insects and unleash the planet's full potential with thick forests and animals.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/55f4b71607b047fbbe6071a67e21a098.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
From chill to hardcore, choose the difficulty level that suits you. Play with starting presets to create new games and experience endless possibilities.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/9f8b86dab3ba22e020c7f3b45647b38a.webp?t=1748077331[/img]
[list][*]Multiplayer: survive by yourself or with friends (1-10+ online co-op) 
[*]Survival: Thirst, Oxygen, Temperature and Health mechanics 
[*]Base Building: shelter from a hostile environment and expand your exploration 
[*]Crafting: equipment, tools and food to help you survive 
[*]Terraformation: turn an entire hostile planet to a habitable paradise!
[*]Build machines to create atmospheric pressure and heat the planet 
[*]Create a biosphere with breathable oxygen
[*]See your environment change as your terraformation progresses
[*]Creatures: create life by decrypting and mixing DNA extracts and make your own animals 
[*]Procedurally generated shipwrecks: explore and find infinite rare loot 
[*]Chill experience with no violence: the only enemy you'll have to fight is the hostile environment 
[*]Adjustable difficulty to fit your level 
[*]Adjustable presets for renewed experiences through time 
[*]Creative mode[/list]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/cbfc26a0ff347e66f836ed0cf2d352a7.poster.avif?t=1748077331" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1284190/extras/cbfc26a0ff347e66f836ed0cf2d352a7.webm?t=1748077331"][/imgvid]
data.strSnippet: A space survival open world terraforming crafting game, designed for 1 to 10 players. Alter the ecosystem of an inhospitable planet to render it habitable for humanity. Survive, gather resources, and build your base. Then, generate oxygen, warmth, and pressure to create a brand new biosphere.
